Scott's JavaScript 30 Day Challenge

Hi! Thanks for stopping by. This is my repo for Wes Bos' JavaScript 30 Challenge, where we write 30 projects in 30 days. I started this project series on April 1st, 2020.
As my projects get completed, I will add them here and you can see my progress as I go along.

Projects

  1. 2020-04-01 - JS Drum Kit
  2. 2020-04-02 - JS/CSS Clock
  3. 2020-04-04 - CSS Variables
  4. 2020-04-04 - Array Cardio Day 1
  5. 2020-04-05 - Flex Panels Image Gallery
  6. 2020-04-09 - Ajax Type Ahead
  7. 2020-04-09 - Array Cardio Day 2
  8. 2020-04-09 - HTML5 Canvas
  9. 2020-04-09 - Dev Tools Domination
  10. 2020-04-11 - Shift to Check Multiple Checkboxes
  11. 2020-04-17 - Custom Video Player
  12. 2020-04-17 - Key Sequence Detection
  13. 2020-04-17 - Slide In On Scroll
